item.title: Video: Ruckus erupts in Jogulamba Gadwal over protocol involving Congress MP and BRS MLA
item.description:
<![CDATA[Video: Ruckus erupts in Jogulamba Gadwal over protocol involving Congress MP and BRS MLA
A protocol dispute at a development programme in Paipadu, Jogulamba Gadwal, led to a confrontation between Congress MP Mallu Ravi and BRS MLA Vijayudu. The clash, triggered during a traditional coconut-breaking ritual, escalated when Ravi allegedly pushed aside Vijayudu.
By Telangana Today Updated On - 20 January 2026, 11:52 PM
Screengrab of a video
Jogulamba Gadwal: Tension prevailed at Paipadu in Vadde...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
